synopsis.text: According to his childhood dreams, Tomoki Sakurai's destiny is entwined with an otherworldly being. Despite his ordinary life as a student, his recurring dreams of a mysterious girl have always left him in tears. One day, his mundane existence is disrupted when a scantily-clad angelic android, Ikaros, descends from the sky and pledges to fulfill his every wish. As Tomoki grapples with his newfound ability to control panties and unleash chaos with his wishes, he must navigate the complexities of having an Angeloid companion. Along with his childhood friend Sohara Mitsuki and the eccentric sky enthusiast Eishirou Sugata, Tomoki forms the New World Discovery Club to learn more about the enigmatic "New World" and the Angeloids that have arrived on Earth. Little does he know, the arrival of Ikaros is just the beginning of a series of extraordinary events that will forever change his life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
